member.name: T:HubKey.Web.Services.SharePoint.SPView
member.summary: Represents a view of the data that is contained in a list on a SharePoint site.

member.name: M:HubKey.Web.Services.SharePoint.SPView.ToString
member.summary: [not implemented] Returns the title of the view.
member.returns: A string that contains the title.

member.name: M:HubKey.Web.Services.SharePoint.SPView.RenderAsHtml
member.summary: [not implemented] Returns the view in HTML format.
member.returns: A string that contains the view in HTML format.

member.name: M:HubKey.Web.Services.SharePoint.SPView.RenderAsHtml(System.Boolean,System.Boolean,System.String)
member.summary: [not implemented] Returns the view in HTML format but allows for rendering within a frameset.
member.returns: A string that contains the view in HTML format.
member.param: true to specify that the view is in a frameset; otherwise, false.
true to display the New List Item button; otherwise, false.
A string that contains the site-relative list view URL in the form "Lists/List_Name/View_File_Name.aspx".

member.name: M:HubKey.Web.Services.SharePoint.SPView.Update
member.summary: Updates the database with changes that are made to the view.

member.name: M:HubKey.Web.Services.SharePoint.SPView.GetAggregationString(System.String)
member.summary: [not implemented] Returns the formula that is implemented in an aggregate, or total, view of a list column.
member.returns: A string that contains the formula.
member.param: A string that represents the type of aggregation that is defined for that field in the view. Possible values include COUNT, AVG, MAX, MIN, SUM, STDEV, and VAR.

member.name: M:HubKey.Web.Services.SharePoint.SPView.Clone(System.String,System.UInt32,System.Boolean,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Creates and returns a duplicate of the view.
member.returns: An object that represents the duplicate view.
member.param: An unsigned 32-bit integer that specifies the maximum number of items to return in the view.
A string that contains the view name.
true if the duplicate view is the default view; otherwise, false.
true if the view supports displaying more items page by page; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:HubKey.Web.Services.SharePoint.SPView.Delete
member.summary: Deletes the list.

member.name: M:HubKey.Web.Services.SharePoint.SPView.ApplyStyle(HubKey.Web.Services.SharePoint.SPViewStyle)
member.summary: [not implemented] Applies the specified style to the view.
member.param: An object that represents the view style.

member.name: M:HubKey.Web.Services.SharePoint.SPView.GetType
member.summary: [not implemented]

member.name: M:HubKey.Web.Services.SharePoint.SPView.Equals(System.Object)
member.summary: [not implemented]

member.summary: [not implemented]

member.summary: [not implemented]

member.name: M:HubKey.Web.Services.SharePoint.SPView.GetHashCode
member.summary: [not implemented]

member.name: P:HubKey.Web.Services.SharePoint.SPView.Views
member.summary: Gets the parent view collection for the view.
member.returns: An object that represents the parent view collection.

member.name: P:HubKey.Web.Services.SharePoint.SPView.ParentList
member.summary: Gets the parent list for the view.
member.returns: A object that represents the list.

member.name: P:HubKey.Web.Services.SharePoint.SPView.ViewFields
member.summary: Gets the view fields that are used in the view.
member.returns: An object that represents the view fields.

member.name: P:HubKey.Web.Services.SharePoint.SPView.Level
member.summary: Gets the level of publication for documents that are displayed in the view.
member.returns: A value that indicates the level of publication.

member.name: P:HubKey.Web.Services.SharePoint.SPView.ID
member.summary: Gets the GUID that identifies the view.
member.returns: A GUID that identifies the view.

member.name: P:HubKey.Web.Services.SharePoint.SPView.Title
member.summary: Gets or sets the display name for the view.
member.returns: A string that contains the display name.

member.name: P:HubKey.Web.Services.SharePoint.SPView.Type
member.summary: Gets the type of the view.
member.returns: A string that specifies a value.

member.name: P:HubKey.Web.Services.SharePoint.SPView.ImageUrl
member.summary: Gets the server-relative URL for the icon that represents the view.
member.returns: A string that contains the URL.

member.name: P:HubKey.Web.Services.SharePoint.SPView.ModerationType
member.summary: [not implemented] Gets the Content Approval type for the view.
member.returns: A string that indicates the Content Approval type, which can be either Contributor or Moderator. The Contributor view shows the pending and rejected items for the current user. The Moderator view is accessible only to users who have managed list permissions and shows the pending and rejected items for all users.

member.name: P:HubKey.Web.Services.SharePoint.SPView.Url
member.summary: Gets the site-relative URL of the page that contains the view.
member.returns: A string that contains the site-relative URL.

member.name: P:HubKey.Web.Services.SharePoint.SPView.ServerRelativeUrl
member.summary: [not implemented] Gets the server-relative URL of the view page.
member.returns: A string that contains the URL.

member.name: P:HubKey.Web.Services.SharePoint.SPView.Hidden
member.summary: [not implemented] Gets or sets a Boolean value that specifies whether the view is hidden.
member.returns: true if the view is hidden; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:HubKey.Web.Services.SharePoint.SPView.ReadOnlyView
member.summary: [not implemented] Gets a Boolean value that indicates whether the view is read-only.
member.returns: true if the view is read-only; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:HubKey.Web.Services.SharePoint.SPView.RequiresClientIntegration
member.summary: [not implemented]

member.name: P:HubKey.Web.Services.SharePoint.SPView.EditorModified
member.summary: [not implemented] Gets a Boolean value that indicates whether the view was modified in an HTML editor.
member.returns: true if the view was modified in an HTML editor; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:HubKey.Web.Services.SharePoint.SPView.Threaded
member.summary: [not implemented] Gets a Boolean value that indicates whether the view is threaded.
member.returns: true if the view is threaded; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:HubKey.Web.Services.SharePoint.SPView.Scope
member.summary: [not implemented] Gets or sets the recursive scope for the view of a document library.
member.returns: An value that specifies the scope.

member.name: P:HubKey.Web.Services.SharePoint.SPView.IncludeRootFolder
member.summary: [not implemented] Gets or sets a Boolean value that specifies whether the root folder is returned in the list view.
member.returns: true to return the root folder in the view; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:HubKey.Web.Services.SharePoint.SPView.DefaultView
member.summary: Gets or sets a Boolean value that specifies whether the view is the default view.
member.returns: true if the view is the default view; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:HubKey.Web.Services.SharePoint.SPView.MobileView
member.summary: [not implemented] Gets or sets a Boolean value that specifies whether the view applies to a mobile device.
member.returns: true if the view applies to a mobile device; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:HubKey.Web.Services.SharePoint.SPView.MobileDefaultView
member.summary: [not implemented] Gets or sets a Boolean value that specifies whether the view is the default view for a mobile device.
member.returns: true if the view is the default view for a mobile device; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:HubKey.Web.Services.SharePoint.SPView.ContentTypeId
member.summary: [not implemented] Gets or sets the ID of the content type with which the view is associated so that the view is available only on folders of this content type.
member.returns: A object that represents ID of the content type with which the view is associated.

member.name: P:HubKey.Web.Services.SharePoint.SPView.DefaultViewForContentType
member.summary: [not implemented] Gets or sets a Boolean value that specifies whether the view is the default view for the associated content type.
member.returns: true if the view is the default view; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:HubKey.Web.Services.SharePoint.SPView.PersonalView
member.summary: Gets a Boolean value that indicates whether the view is personalized.
member.returns: true if the view is personalized; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:HubKey.Web.Services.SharePoint.SPView.RecurrenceRowset
member.summary: [not implemented] Gets a Boolean value that specifies whether the view supports recurrence rowsets.
member.returns: true if the view supports recurrence; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:HubKey.Web.Services.SharePoint.SPView.OrderedView
member.summary: [not implemented] Gets a Boolean value that indicates whether users can reorder items through the user interface.
member.returns: true if items can be reordered; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:HubKey.Web.Services.SharePoint.SPView.Query

member.name: P:HubKey.Net.FrontPageRPC.RequestBase.UseFrontPageRPCWebRequest
member.summary: Gets or sets whether to use the FrontPageRPCWebRequest object instead of HTTPWebRequest. Default for Uploading documents.
member.remarks: FrontPageRPCWebRequest allows streaming from a filestream rather than loading into memory first. Setting HTTPWebRequest.AllowWriteStreamBuffering = false has an issue described at http://support.microsoft.com/kb/908573 which seems to be difficult to avoid with FPSE FrontPageRPC calls.

member.name: M:HubKey.Net.FrontPageRPC.UploadDocumentRequest.#ctor(HubKey.Net.FrontPageRPC.Document)
member.summary: Provides a method to write a single file to a directory in an existing Web site.
member.param: The document to upload, including the System.IO.FileInfo path and meta data as required.

member.name: P:HubKey.Net.FrontPageRPC.UploadDocumentRequest.Document
member.summary: Gets or sets the document to upload, including the System.IO.FileInfo path and meta data as required.

member.name: P:HubKey.Net.FrontPageRPC.UploadDocumentRequest.PutOption
member.summary: A set of flags describing how the operation behaves.

member.name: P:HubKey.Net.FrontPageRPC.UploadDocumentRequest.Comment
member.summary: Gets or sets a string value that provides a checkin comment for the file being uploaded. The server MUST ignore this parameter unless the "checkin" PUT-OPTION-VAL is specified in the put_option parameter. Because clients conforming to the FrontPage Server Extensions Remote Protocol MUST NOT send the "checkin" PUT_OPTION_VAL, as specified in Put-Option, servers MAY ignore this parameter.

member.name: P:HubKey.Net.FrontPageRPC.UploadDocumentRequest.KeepCheckedOut
member.summary: Gets or sets a boolean value used to determine a specified document's behavior in source control. If true, the document SHOULD be checked in to source control and immediately checked back out; if false, the document SHOULD be checked in. The server MUST treat this as equivalent to the "checkout" PUT-OPTION-VAL, as specified in Put-Option. Clients conforming to the FrontPage Server Extensions Remote Protocol MUST send false, either explicitly or by omitting this parameter.

member.name: P:HubKey.Net.FrontPageRPC.UploadDocumentRequest.UpdateAllMetaInfo
member.summary: Gets or sets a boolean value used to determine whether only changed meta info is updated on the server.

true to convert an existing folder of the same name to a SharePoint site. false to throw an exception that indicates that a URL path with the specified site name already exists.

true to create a subsite that does not inherit permissions from another site; otherwise, false .

member.returns: true if the user has permissions for the specified set of rights; otherwise, false. The permissions are checked against the reusable ACL, and the results do not depend on the specified object. If you do not specify an object, Windows SharePoint Services uses the root Web site in the site collection. If you already initialized an object, specifying it can improve performance because you do not need to initialize the root Web site.

An value that specifies base permissions for the site collection.
An object that represents a reusable access control list (ACL).

member.name: M:HubKey.Web.Services.SharePoint.SPWeb.GetSiteData(HubKey.Web.Services.SharePoint.SPSiteDataQuery)
member.summary: [not implemented] Performs a query for list items across multiple lists, which can be located in multiple Web sites in the same Web site collection.
member.returns: A System.Data.DataTable object that represents the result of the query. Each DataRow object in the DataTable.Rows collection represents a single item that satisfies the query. Each DataColumn object in the DataTable.Columns collection represents a field that is requested in the query fields, and the column name of the field equals the value of the Name attribute for that field. In addition, DataTable.Columns contains a DataColumn named ListId, which identifies the list that contains each item, a DataColumn named WebId, which identifies the Web site that contains each item, and a DataColumn named ID, which identifies each item.
member.param: An object that describes the query to perform, as well as specifying which Web sites and lists participate, which fields to return, and the Where and OrderBy sections to apply.

member.name: F:HubKey.Net.FrontPageRPC.RenameOptionEnum.CreateDir
member.summary: Creates the parent directory if it does not already exist. This flag is analogous to the "createdir" PUT-OPTION-VAL (as specified in Put-Option) and has the same semantics.

member.name: F:HubKey.Net.FrontPageRPC.RenameOptionEnum.FindBacklinks
member.summary: Requests that servers, implementing link fixup, fix the linked files other than those moved. The server MAY ignore this flag.

member.name: F:HubKey.Net.FrontPageRPC.RenameOptionEnum.NoChangeAll
member.summary: Do not perform link fixup on links in moved documents. This parameter is used in publishing scenarios. Clients conforming to the FrontPage Server Extensions Remote Protocol MUST NOT send this option. The server MAY ignore this.

member.name: F:HubKey.Net.FrontPageRPC.RenameOptionEnum.PatchPrefix
member.summary: Simulates the move of a directory rather than a file. Clients conforming to the FrontPage Server Extensions:Website Management MUST NOT send this option; the server SHOULD ignore this flag for the usage defined in this document.

member.name: F:HubKey.Net.FrontPageRPC.RenameOptionEnum.None
member.summary: The client MUST send "none" if it does not want to specify any of the options .

member.name: F:HubKey.Net.FrontPageRPC.PutOptionEnum.Overwrite
member.summary: Uses the date and time the document was last modified, as specified in the inbound metainfo, rather than the extent of time on the server.

member.name: F:HubKey.Net.FrontPageRPC.PutOptionEnum.CreateDir
member.summary: The parent directory is created if it does not exist. When this option is not sent by the client, the server MUST require that the parent directory of a file or folder exists; if the client sends this option, the server SHOULD create the immediate parent of the file being created if needed and if possible. For example, if this option is sent and folder1/folder2/file.txt is being created, the server SHOULD create folder2 if needed, but SHOULD NOT create folder1 if it does not already exist.

member.name: F:HubKey.Net.FrontPageRPC.PutOptionEnum.MigrationSemantics
member.summary: Not used by the FrontPage Server Extensions Remote Protocol. Preserves information about who created the file and when. Clients conforming to the FrontPage Server Extensions Remote Protocol MUST NOT send this option. The server MAY ignore this option. If the server wants to honor this option, it SHOULD do additional authorization and ignore the option if the authorization fails.

member.name: F:HubKey.Net.FrontPageRPC.PutOptionEnum.Atomic
member.summary: If this flag is specified, the server does all the needed checking to ensure that all the files can be updated before changing the first one. The server MAY ignore this.

member.name: F:HubKey.Net.FrontPageRPC.PutOptionEnum.Checkin
member.summary: The document is checked in after it is saved. This flag is only used to support long-term checkout operations. Clients conforming to the FrontPage Server Extensions Remote Protocol MUST NOT send this. Servers MAY ignore this parameter if they choose not to support long-term checkout.

member.name: F:HubKey.Net.FrontPageRPC.PutOptionEnum.Checkout
member.summary: Valid only if checkin is specified. Notifies the source control of the new content (checkin), but keeps the document checked out. (This is the equivalent to checking the document in, and then checking it out again.) Clients conforming to the FrontPage Server Extensions Remote Protocol defined in this document MUST NOT send this option. Servers MAY ignore this parameter.

member.name: F:HubKey.Net.FrontPageRPC.PutOptionEnum.Edit
member.summary: Uses the date and time the document was last modified to determine whether the item has been concurrently modified by another user. This flag is used to prevent race conditions where two users could edit the same data. If this flag is specified and the inbound modification time does not match the value on the server, the server MUST reject the upload. The client SHOULD send this flag unless a higher level has indicated it needs to overwrite changes.

member.name: F:HubKey.Net.FrontPageRPC.PutOptionEnum.ForceVersions
member.summary: Not used by the FrontPage Server Extensions Remote Protocol. Acts as though versioning is enabled, even if it is not. Clients conforming to the FrontPage Server Extensions Remote Protocol MUST NOT send this option. Servers MAY ignore this parameter.

member.name: F:HubKey.Net.FrontPageRPC.PutOptionEnum.ListThickets
member.summary: Not used by the FrontPage Server Extensions Remote Protocol. Acts as though versioning is enabled, even if it is not. Clients conforming to the FrontPage Server Extensions Remote Protocol MUST NOT send this option. Servers MAY ignore this parameter.

member.name: F:HubKey.Net.FrontPageRPC.PutOptionEnum.Thicket
member.summary: Specifies that the associated file is a thicket supporting file. The server SHOULD detect that the upload includes a thicket supporting file and infer this flag.

member.name: F:HubKey.Net.FrontPageRPC.PutOptionEnum.Default
member.summary: Default put option - Overwrite | CreateDir

member.name: F:HubKey.Net.FrontPageRPC.ErrorFlagsEnum.KeepGoing
member.summary: Associated with an error that can be ignored.

member.name: F:HubKey.Net.FrontPageRPC.ErrorFlagsEnum.StopOnFirst
member.summary: Processing stops when an error occurs.

member.name: F:HubKey.Net.FrontPageRPC.ErrorFlagsEnum.Atomic
member.summary: Not currently implemented.

member.name: F:HubKey.Net.FrontPageRPC.GetOptionEnum.none
member.summary: Do not check out the file.

member.name: F:HubKey.Net.FrontPageRPC.GetOptionEnum.chkoutExclusive
member.summary: Check out the file exclusively, which fails if the file is already checked out by another user.

member.name: F:HubKey.Net.FrontPageRPC.GetOptionEnum.chkoutNonExclusive
member.summary: Check out the file nonexclusively, if the source control system in use is configured to allow nonexclusive check-outs.

member.name: F:HubKey.Net.FrontPageRPC.DepthEnum.Zero
member.summary: The method is applied only to the resource.

member.name: F:HubKey.Net.FrontPageRPC.DepthEnum.One
member.summary: The method is applied to the resource and to its immediate children.

member.name: F:HubKey.Net.FrontPageRPC.DepthEnum.OneNoRoot
member.summary: The method is applied only to resources immediately subordinate to the target Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) but the target resource itself is excluded.

member.name: F:HubKey.Net.FrontPageRPC.DepthEnum.Infinity
member.summary: The method is applied to the resource and to all of its children.

member.name: F:HubKey.Net.FrontPageRPC.DepthEnum.InfinityNoRoot
member.summary: The method is applied recursively to all resources subordinate to the target but the target resource itself is excluded.

member.name: M:HubKey.Web.Services.SharePoint.SPList.CheckPermissions(HubKey.Web.Services.SharePoint.SPBasePermissions)
member.summary: [not implemented] Checks the permissions for the list and throws UnauthorizedAccessException if the current user does not have the specified set of rights.
member.param: An value that specifies permissions for the list. See also . If the permission of the current user on the current list object does not include all the bits that are specified in the permissionMask parameter, UnauthorizedAccessException is thrown. When the code is running within a Web application, the user may be redirected to /_layouts/AccessDenied.aspx.

member.name: M:HubKey.Web.Services.SharePoint.SPFileStream.Read(System.Byte[],System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Reads a sequence of bytes from the current stream and advances the position within the stream by the number of bytes read.
member.param: An array of bytes. When this method returns, the buffer contains the specified byte array with the values between offset and (offset + count - 1) replaced by the bytes read from the current source.
The zero-based byte offset in buffer at which to begin storing the data read from the current stream.

The maximum number of bytes to be read from the current stream. On the first call to read this sets the chunk size which will then override further count paramters until the end of the stream is read.
member.returns: The total number of bytes read into the buffer. This can be less than the number of bytes requested if that many bytes are not currently available, or zero (0) if the end of the stream has been reached.
member.remarks: The first call to read initiates the file download which will write all the file bytes to a queue which is then read by this method.

member.name: P:HubKey.Net.FrontPageRPC.ListDocumentsRequest.ListExplorerDocs
member.summary: Gets or sets the listExplorerDocs parameter. True to generate a list of the task list files (_x_todo.xml and _x_todh.xml). No merging takes place with any task list on the destination Web site. The originating server replaces the existing task list on the destination site with its own task list. If false, no task list data is sent from the originating server.

member.name: P:HubKey.Net.FrontPageRPC.ListDocumentsRequest.ListHiddenDocs
member.summary: Gets or sets whether to list hidden documents in a Web site. Note that hidden documents are files and folders whose URLs contain a path component that begins with an underscore.

member.name: P:HubKey.Net.FrontPageRPC.ListDocumentsRequest.ListIncludeParent
member.summary: Gets or sets the listIncludeParent parameter. If this parameter is set to true, an entry for the InitialUrl parameter is returned. If set to false, no entry is returned for the InitialUrl parameter.

member.name: P:HubKey.Net.FrontPageRPC.ListDocumentsRequest.ListDerived
member.summary: Gets or sets the listDerived parameter. Sending this parameter generates a list of files in _derived folders. FrontPage Server Extensions from Microsoft generates _derived folders dynamically. These files can be regenerated at any time and include .htx and .gif files, such as files created by the search component, and composite text for use with GIF images, such as those used for theme buttons.

member.name: P:HubKey.Net.FrontPageRPC.ListDocumentsRequest.ListBorders

member.summary: Gets or sets the listChildWebs parameter. If the value is set true, the return value includes the names of folders for subsites.

member.summary: Gets or sets a boolean value that specifies if thicket supporting files and folders should be included in the server response.

member.summary: Gets or sets the URL of the folder from which to initially list documents or, if no folder is given, either "" or "/" to indicate the root folder of the Web site.

member.name: M:HubKey.Net.FrontPageRPC.WebClient.#ctor(System.String)

member.name: M:HubKey.Net.FrontPageRPC.WebClient.CancelAsync
member.summary: Provides a method to cancel asynchronous requests. For UploadDocumentsAsync and DownloadDocumentsAsync, the request will be canceled after the current document has been processed. Use the abort override to cancel immediately.

member.name: M:HubKey.Net.FrontPageRPC.WebClient.CancelAsync(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Provides a method to cancel asynchronous requests.
member.param: Set true to immediately stop the request. Set false to stop the request after each discrete operation, e.g. uploading an individual file, has completed.

member.name: M:HubKey.Net.FrontPageRPC.WebClient.GetProperties(System.String,HubKey.Net.FrontPageRPC.DepthEnum,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Returns resource properties for a url using the WebDAV PROPFIND method.

The level to apply the PROPFIND method to. For a recursive list of all properties for example, use DepthEnum.Infinity.

The full url of the new location.

member.name: M:HubKey.Net.FrontPageRPC.WebClient.MoveDocument(System.String,System.String,System.Boolean,System.Boolean,HubKey.Net.FrontPageRPC.PutOptionEnum)
member.summary: Moves, renames or copies a document or folder.
member.param: The full url of the document or folder to move.
The full url of the new location.
If the value is true, the method copies the source to the destination.
Pass true to ensure that all parent folders are created before the move request is made to the server. The createdirs putoption only creates the first parent folder if it does not exist.
